title: Beautiful 3-bed/1/bath rental home in Port Richmond
description:
Big, beautiful rowhome in Port Richmond. A sizable porch and backyard add to an already-spacious home.
3 bed, 1 bath, with washer/dryer.
The neighborhood has ample street parking and is minutes from I95.
A two block walk to either Aramingo or Allegheny gives rich public transit options as well. Slightly further is the 15 trolley on Richmond Ave.
Great neighborhood for restaurants and food in general. Originally as a working-class Catholic neighborhood, Port Richmond blends the "new and old" agreeably.
The house is a short walk to Reanimator Coffee, Lunar Inn, Czerw's Kielbasy, and Byrne's Seafood.
Seeking tenant for March 1st lease. Available for move in currently.
Owner pays water bill. Tenant responsible for other utilities.
12-month lease @ $1800 / month
18-month lease @ $1700 / month
First month, last month, and 1-month security deposit (to be returned less damages) are all due at lease up.
If you are interested, please send a LinkedIn (or other resume) for all potential lease-holders.

title: Beautiful, light, spacious 3bd apartment in the Front neighborhood
description:
Beautiful, light, spacious 3bd apartment in the Front neighborhood, just north of downtown Philadelphia. Apr. 700 sq. ft. Available March 22, 2023.
It's 1.3 m to UGA, less than 1 m. to downtown and 1 m. to Piedmont Philadelphia Regional. An easy biking or walking distance to tons of amenities, and near public transportation.
Wood flooring, vaulted ceiling, lots of windows with great light and view. Kitchenette, full bath, private entrance, huge open room that can be arranged how you want. Off-street parking space.
$900/mo. includes all utilities. Requires a $900 deposit, references, and a lease that will run from March 22 to either Jan. 2023 or Aug. 2023.
1 person preferred. If it's 2 people another $90/mo will be added to cover utilities. Sorry, no pets.
It comes furnished with a full-sized bed, sofa, rugs and some other things. If you don't need them we can talk about taking them out. It is not easy (and maybe impossible) to move large furniture up the stairs and into the apartment, so take that into consideration.
Looking for someone who is relatively quiet (especially at night) and at least somewhat frugal with energy (like the HVAC system).
PETS OK. SECTION 8 OK. PLEASE TEXT FOR MORE INFORMATION___ show contact info
___THANKS.

title: Spacious 2 Bedroom Rowhouse in Fishtown
description:
This spacious 2 bedroom, 1.5 bathroom rowhouse is located in the trendy Fishtown neighborhood of Philadelphia. The home boasts a versatile open-concept floor plan, with a large living room and a separate dining area that can easily accommodate all your family and entertaining needs. The kitchen is outfitted with modern appliances, ample counter space, and a breakfast bar. There is a convenient half bath on this floor.
The second floor is where you'll find the two bedrooms, both with plenty of natural light and ample closet space. The full bathroom is also located on this floor, with a double vanity and tub/shower combination.
Situated in the heart of Fishtown, this property is just steps from popular restaurants, cafes, and shops. This is your chance to own a piece of one of Philadelphia's most sought-after neighborhoods.
Other rehabs coming to market in Northern Liberties, Fairmount, Olde and East Kensington.
This property allows some pets with deposit. Tenants pay all utilities except water which is included in the rent.
Please email with questions and to schedule a showing.
1st/Last/Security to move in. No short term rentals. No Subleasing.
Email to set up a showing.

title: Society Hill 2 Bedroom with Parking included!
description:
This 2 bedroom, 1 bath condo, located in Society Hill, features exposed wood beams and brick walls displaying its warm historical features. Living room offers a wood burning fireplace with the warmth continuing into your beautiful dining room area.
Galley kitchen greets you with lots of cabinet storage, Corian countertops and dishwasher. Each spacious bedroom offers rich hardwood style laminate flooring that continues throughout. Updated bathroom boasts a large shower, tons of counter space and a large vanity. Convenient stacked washer and dryer is included as well as your own parking space provided in the gated, covered garage.
No smoking and pets are allowed. Tenant pays for all utilities except for water. The location of this condo is in walking distance to fantastic restaurants and quick access to I-95 and to all of your Philadelphia travel. Don’t want to see this charming condo waiting for you to move right in!
Listing provided by RE/MAX Main Line-Paoli

title: Renovated Studio Apartment Home with South-Facing Windows
description:
The unfurnished studio apartment home at 2510 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 25th floor features large windows that face south and have a Chancellor Street view including a peak of South Philadelphia in between high-rise buildings. We plan to renovate this particular home. Be the first to enjoy new renovations! This renovated kitchen will be nice with its white cabinets and granite counters. This kitchen will be fully-equipped with a gas stove, microwave, disposal, and dishwasher. This home will have wood floors. Move into your new home as early as February 15, 2023!
All utilities, except for cable and internet, are included. You have your choice of cable and/or internet provider.
Our amenities are amazing! This community offers a sauna, package room, lounge, fitness center, fitness/yoga studio, dog spa, guest suites, and bicycle storage. Lounge 201 includes a pool table, media room, printer/copier, conference room, demonstration kitchen, dining area, and cozy seating areas. Plus, we are renovating our roof deck! There is a front door attendant and a front desk concierge. In this building, there is a laundry room on every floor. Plus, you may do multiple loads of laundry at the same time in our large laundry facility on the third floor. We have an attached parking garage! Please note that this valet parking garage is not managed by this community, so the monthly parking fee is separate.
This building has such a convenient location! Nearby grocery stores and food markets are Trader Joe's, Giant, Rittenhouse Market, Aldi, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, Acme, Whole Foods, Spruce Food Market, Sue's Produce Market, Venditore by Giordano, Maxx's Produce, Di Bruno Bros., and the Reading Terminal Market. There are a couple of Fine Wine & Good Spirits locations nearby. Shop at retail shops on Rittenhouse Row like Anthropologie, Lovesac, and L'Occitane en Provence. Dine out at the restaurants on the block: Rouge, Devon, and Parc. Restaurant Aleksandar, Twenty Manning, and Marathon on the Square are also in the neighborhood. Grab a bagel at Kismet Bagels. Buy a brookie from The Bakeshop on 20th. Savor a cappuccino at K'Far Cafe, La Colombe, and Elixr. Have a facial at Rescue Spa. Relax in the park at Rittenhouse Square.
Wondering if this home is still available for rent at the Rittenhouse Claridge? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 2510 is still listed under the Dali floor plan! Please make an appointment to tour with Michelle or Gabby using ResMate, our chatbot concierge, on our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com.
Price posted is for the 22 month lease term.
For an unfurnished home, 2 to 22 month lease terms are available!
Rental rates, availability, and apartment home features are subject to change without notice.
We can furnish a home for you over 2 weeks following rental application approval and after the home is made ready. Please note that there is a 3 month lease term minimum for a furnished home. You would pay a furnished rent instead of an unfurnished rent. We can calculate this furnished rent for you based upon your choices of home furnishings.
Welcome home!

3 N Columbus Blvd, Philadelphia, PA 19106
Southern facing 1 Bed, 1 bath unit with balcony facing the water. title: Seasonal Bike Share Program, This is a cat friendly community
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

title: Complimentary Wi-Fi lounge, 24/7 emergency maintenance service
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.
